description: Variation of Condition 1 (approved drawings) and removal of condition 8 (supplementary acoustic report) of planning permission dated 15 July 2021 (RN: 21/03500/FULL) for, 'Alterations including partial infilling of rear courtyard on basement and ground floors, rear extensions on first to fifth floors and at sixth floor roof extension with plant enclosure, roof terrace and green roof above all to provide additional office accommodation (Class B1); new balconies/terraces at front fourth, fifth and seventh floor levels and rear first, sixth and seventh floor levels. Flexible use of part basement and part ground floor for either retail / office/ gym use (Class A1/ B1/ D2), provision of cycle parking and associated external alterations'; Namely, adjustment and addition of acoustic enclosures and screens associated with external plant on the lower ground floor, first floor and level eight; fa√ßade alterations to the refuse store area on Upper John Street; updates to roof terrace design on level one; new external numeral signage to main entrance and to supply a supplementary acoustic report. (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
